replies.body:
Good at sword, good at bow, great skill set, scared of you all the time.
We should talk more, though I don't talk much myself. You're friendly and fun to be around.
Kohi, I find Badlion PvP really weird for some reason. I hardly play any of them now though, because my internet is becoming worse and I lag.
I'll be honest, I've eyed Apollo for sooo long, only to have my dreams crushed.

replies.body:
I don't know you very well at all, but you are way less toxic than before, which I really like.
Haven't fought you much as well, but I can tell you're good at melee and the gamemode on general. Decent leader. Considering you originated from OCN, no surprise
I don't feel like making one, not that type of person. Most likely will be filled with players from top tier teams.

replies.body:
Snapcraft Earthgames went down, wanted team pvp games. So I googled that and found this. Also inspired by something BajanCanadian played, Equinox was it?
Giraffe/Dolphin
Another friend that I've known for a while, went inactive after prestiges disappeared but back active again. Good friend and nice to be around, improving as a player in terms of both melee and bow, which is good too see. Almost always seen with NDLFC and 28cheetah :P
